author: James Crump, James Crump
title: Coronavirus: US congressman claims there's a 'powder' curing Germans of Covid-19
description: 'Any time in the next 14 days that the virus touches anything that's been sprayed it is killed'
content:
Republican congressman Louie Gohmert falsely claimed that Germany is using a powder to help prevent health care workers from contracting Covid-19.
Earlier this month, during an interview with KLTV in Texas, Mr Gohmert claimed that health care workers were be… [+2072 chars]
